name: Ray of Enfeeblement
text: A coruscating ray springs from your hand. You must succeed on a ranged touch attack to strike a target. The subject takes a penalty to Strength equal to 1d6+1 per two caster levels (maximum 1d6+5). The subject's Strength score cannot drop below 1. A successful Fortitude save reduces this penalty by half. This penalty does not stack with itself. Apply the highest penalty instead.
mythicText: The Strength penalty increases to 1d8 + 1 per 2 caster levels (maximum +10). If the target fails its save, it’s fatigued.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则减半; 见文本
text_zh: 一条闪烁的射线从你的手中射出。你必须成功进行一次远程接触攻击以击中目标。目标受到 {1d6+每2CL 1} (最多1d6+5) 点的力量减值。目标的力量属性不能降低到1点以下。成功的强韧豁免会使减值减半。这个减值自身不会叠加。产生多个减值时，将最高的减值应用至目标身上。
mythicText_zh: 力量减值增加至1d8 + 每两个施法者等级1点（最高+10）。若目标豁免失败，则会疲乏（fatigued）。
